name: Barro T23
description:
Barro T23 is the new generation of Barro, now with a new style of race tracks but, with the good old toy car/ go kart arcade style!

  • 2 types of trucks
  • 14 new race tracks
  • Improved time trial (Leaderboard lap-by-lap | Fight for your position in real time!)
  • Single player
  • Up to 4 players local split screen
  • Up to 10 cars on the grid
